function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Confined and enclosed spaces causing poor ventilation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Adopting an open planning approach to design the neighbourhood","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Residents, workers, visitors","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, building designers"},{"Description":"Lack of healthy building design","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to pandemics like COVID-19","Mitigation":"Incorporating climatic issues into building design for public health","Technologies":"Passive design strategies, green building materials","People":"Building occupants, public health officials","Owner":"Architects, building developers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of equipment for hygiene at entry points","Impact":"Increased transmission risk at entry points","Mitigation":"Placement of wash basins and shoe cleaning trays at entry points","Technologies":"Touchless fixtures, self-cleaning materials","People":"Residents, visitors, service providers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of community transmission control measures","Impact":"Higher community transmission rates","Mitigation":"Implementation of socio-economic policies and infrastructure improvements","Technologies":"Community health programs, information campaigns","People":"Community residents, local authorities, health workers","Owner":"Local government, community stakeholders"}]}
